translated: The Baths of Caracalla (who were called in Latin Thermae Antoninianae) are Roman baths, located on a large flat land south of Rome near the Appian Way.
original: Les thermes de Caracalla (qui étaient appelés en latin Thermae Antoninianae) sont des thermes romains, situés sur un vaste terrain plat du sud de Rome, près de la voie Appienne.
